mapper.update:
update user
upasswd = #{upasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
regtime = #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
rank = #{rank,jdbcType=TINYINT},
lognum = #{lognum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set upasswd = #{upasswd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regtime = #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lognum = #{lognum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
